name: Magnus UI
desc: Magnus UI is the ultimate UI framework that helps you in building consistent user interfaces effortlessly in react native

name: React Native UI Lib
desc: React Native UI (RNUI) is a UI Toolset & Components Library for React Native from Wix

name: React Native Paper
desc: React Native Paper is a high-quality, standard-compliant Material Design library that has you covered in all major use-cases

name: UI Kitten
desc: UI Kitten is React Native framework for creating stunning cross-platform mobile applications. Design system based, brings your product from MVP to enterprise.

name: React Native Elements
desc: Cross Platform React Native UI Toolkit that provides an all-in-one UI kit for creating apps in react native.

name: NativeBase
desc: Essential cross-platform UI components for React Native & Vue Native.

name: Shoutem UI
desc: Shoutem UI toolkit enables you to build professionally looking React Native apps with ease.

name: tailwind-rn
desc: Use Tailwind CSS in React Native projects.

name: Ant Design Mobile RN
desc: An Ant design based configurable Mobile UI component library based on React Native.

name: SnackUI
desc: SnackUI is a UI Kit for React Native + react-native-web that's much faster rocket with an optimizing compiler.

name: Moti
desc: Moti is the universal animation package for React Native
